item.title: Talking npc's
item.dc:creator: @Devilwabad1 Devilwabad1
item.description:
@Devilwabad1 wrote:

Ok in your Npchandler.java add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) { if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome home"; } }

Make sure you spawn it at the right point in your Autospawn.cfg
If you get any errors please post them

Read full topic

item.title: Talking npc's
item.dc:creator: @imjammy780 imjammy780
item.description:
@imjammy780 wrote:

Ive got some npc’s to speak but i want to cheerleaders to speak at my ‘home’ area. ive got the npc’s there and ive added this to NPChandler.java:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome home"; } }

But they dont speak, can it only be certain npcs or any?

can anybody help me?

Thanks,
------ImJammy------

Read full topic
